plugin-data.name: Piwik Analytics
plugin-data.description: This plugin appends the Piwik tracking code to the head part of the site.

complete-this-field-with-the-piwik-serve: Complete this field with Piwik's server Full Qualified Domain Name, e.g. piwik.myserver.com
complete-this-field-with-the-piwik-site-: Complete this field with the tracked site ID (look for it in Piwik's tracking code on the line _paq.push(['setSiteId', 'id#']);)
